mapper.insert: insert into kms_template (template_id, template_name, is_built_in, node, start_date, end_date, key_usages, extend_usages) VALUES (#{templateId}, #{templateName}, #{isBuiltIn}, #{node}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{keyUsages}, #{extendUsages})
mapper.update: update kms_template set template_name=#{templateName}, node=#{node}, start_date=#{startDate}, end_date=#{endDate}, key_usages=#{keyUsages}, extend_usages=#{extendUsages} where template_id=#{templateId}
update kms_template set status = #{status} where template_id =#{templateId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from kms_template where template_name=#{name}
